entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ignace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. A few flurries beginning late this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
